name: Hujan Pentol
description:
Pentol catching game

Control :

Left Arrow - Move the pan to the left

Right Arrow - Move the pan to the right

Shift - Boost the pan's speed

Rules :

Catch Pentol +1 score

Pentol fallen -1 score

Catch chili -1 health

Catch water bottle +1 health

Lose Condition :

-Score reached -5

-Health less than 1

------------------------

Game Designer : M A Romadhon, Nauval Ahmad Faiz, Yohafen Nevada

Programer : Ahmad Adyatma A

Artist : Aisha Aurora
